1.0.4.name: wordpress/rs-buddypress-activity-refresh
1.0.4.description:
This plugin will check automatically for new activities and comments and add them to the activity stream.

The JavaScript file "refresh.js" will send every 10 seconds an ajax request to wp-load.php to get the new activities. If there are new activities, they will be prepend to the activity list. Comments will appear in stream mode.

While developing we noticed performance problems on our test server (very old WAMP). So we changed the refresh rate to 60 seconds. On our new server we haven't those problems.
